adrFormatAddress: 3682 Broadway Suite #2A, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: I have been going to Leara Acupuncture for 5 weeks now and I am amazed at how well I am feeling. Leara is personable and knowledgeable about her practice. When you come into her space you immediately experience a calm and serene atmosphere.  She asked me questions about my health history and made recommendations that would have an overall positive affect on my quality of health. Her energy and compassionate approach has been amazing.  I would highly recommend Leara your Acupuncture and wellness needs.

originalText.text:
Wonderful experience! I was having agonizing nerve pain and I found Leara. I text her 40 minutes before she was closing and she graciously allowed me to come to her space.

She did 3 modalities and I was on her warm and cozy table for 2.5 hours.  I left feeling so much better and by the next day the pain was completely gone.

She was so good my hubby went the next day and had a great experience as well.

I highly recommend!

originalText.text:
The pandemic has been hard on all of us. I tried everything - therapy, exercise, groups, etc - but the only thing that’s made me feel at ease are my regular visits here! Leara is so special. She’s a natural healer that really cares about her patients. She is highly educated but still able to explain complicated concepts to regular degular people. I love it here! The studio is truly an oasis uptown.

She’s culturally competent, community focused, compassionate and just a joy to be around. Don’t wait, if you’re ready to start a healing journey or maintain good health, definitely book a session you won’t be disappointed!

originalText.text: My appointment was perfect . I have been coming here off and on for years   Her place is very relaxing clean and therapeutic . Mrs.Graves was very informative and soft .

text.text: My appointment was perfect . I have been coming here off and on for years   Her place is very relaxing clean and therapeutic . Mrs.Graves was very informative and soft .

originalText.text:
First, Dr. Leara is amazing; her energy and empathy, you can tell she genuinely cares about the  service she provides. Our conversation was easy and flowing (I can talk to her for hours).

The Experience: I was welcomed into a calm soothing atmosphere with frequencies and essential oils. We then discussed my health history and ailments and she used this information to make suggestions for  affirmations, resources and essential oils. I had cupping followed by acupunture and left feeling so relaxed but ready to rest.

The Results: I have had the most amazing 2 weeks!! I feel so amazing both mentally and physically and this is only after 1 session. This is definitely something to add to your self care/self love routine.

I can't wait to see Dr. Leera again!!!
